conventions.dash_policy: classify em/en/hyphen as separate tokens; all dash types normalize to "-"
conventions.bracket_policy: strip underscores and outer brackets from stage spans

spans.text: An Old Shepherd, reputed father of Perdita
Officers of a Court of Judicature
PERDITA, daughter to Leontes and Hermione
EMILIA, a lady attending on the Queen
Other Ladies, attending on the Queen
Lords, Ladies, and Attendants; Satyrs for a Dance; Shepherds,
Scene: Sometimes in Sicilia; sometimes in Bohemia.
